Text: Thanks Froggie! Ribbit! For an HD, the quality is the SAME as 26K's prev Ice Age 4 version.  Yes, same!  There's even FLICKERING in very bright scenes, where there wasn't in the prev version.  And the ending is a tad bit shorter than the prev version.  So I was a very sad panda to find out that this HD version is not really any better.  Just the title is in English instead of Spanish.  So what?!
Thank Ya Frogman! I appreciate ur work & dedication to provide us with Cinema!
